channel.title: How do i remove the price items from the shop?[READ]
channel.description:
I have a project insanity server, and i made it Spawn Pvp server.
My question: How i make when players open a shop and buy anything for free no need to money.
Please explain.
Thanks.

item.title: How do i remove the price items from the shop?[READ]
item.dc:creator: @marc110 marc110
item.description:
@marc110 wrote:

[quote=“Bhpk, post:8, topic:508396”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=626635.msg4261093#msg4261093 date=1363467643]

Data -> cfg -> item.cfg -> change the price here.

For some servers it’s different.
For me it’s:

Data -> Cfg -> Prices.txt
[/quote]Tried this way and still not works.[/quote]

its inside item.gl on easyrsc

Read full topic

[quote=“Jc22493, post:4, topic:508396”][quote author=Bhpk link=topic=626635.msg4261051#msg4261051 date=1363465750]

try to edit how much the items cost in the specified file to 0 and then try to buy them from the shop.
[/quote]can’t find, please need someone to tell me how, if you are not sure please don’t reply.

If you’re not going to post in the right section, don’t post.[/quote]Lol, yeah i think this is not the right section, anyway move it or keep it. Sorry
